description: The Department of National Defense has a requirement for articulating lifts.
full_summary:
# Articulating Lifts (Nacelles Articulées)
## Tender Notice (Avis d'appel d'offres)

### Reference
* Reference Number:  cb-993-86985643
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: W8475-E60HS-18LIFT/A
* Publication Date: 2024-07-23
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-08-07T14:00:00 (UTC)

### Tender Description
The Department of National Defense has a requirement for articulating lifts. Bidders must hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Standing Offer (RFSA) E60HS-18LIFT/A to participate in this bid solicitation process.

Contracting Authority:
* Name: Christine Bertrand
* E-mail: Christine.Bertrand@forces.gc.ca
* Phone Number: (000) 000-0000

**Regional Opportunities**
* Articulating lifts will be used in Canada and Quebec (excluding National Capital Region).

**Delivery Information**
* The requested delivery date is March 31, 2025.

**Evaluation Criteria**
* The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price.

**Solicitation Method**
* Competitive - Open bidding

**Additional Information**
* Business opportunities and procurement data are available on the Buy and Sell Platform (Ordre-Alliance).
* Suppliers interested in this procurement must be pre-qualified under RFSA E60HS-18LIFT/A.

**Ask Us a Question or Request a Debriefing**
* Contact the contracting authority within 15 working days of bid submission to request more information or clarification.

[Attachment]
Download the tender notice and procurement documents at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/42907/eng-rfp-w8475-e60hs-lift_0.pdf (English) and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/42907/french-rfp-w8475-e60hs-lift.pdf (French)  Estimated Tender Closing Date: August 7, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST.  Note: Cancelled
Let me know if this looks good. 

Here is the contract rewritten as per the requirements.
